title: Chocolate Buddha
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A communal Japanese dining restaurant with various vegan dishes including edamame, renkon crisps, nasu dengaku, age dashi tofu (with fresh tofu not fried), tofu salad, vegetable maki, tofu ankake don (with fresh tofu) and miso udon (fresh tofu). Note: The mayo is not vegan. Always ask for fresh tofu as the fried is not vegan. Vegan items are not clearly labeled.
